spell_tooltip.description: Owlkin Frenzy can stack up to 2 times and reduces the cast time of your next Cyclone or Entangling Roots by 10%.

Starfall calls down collapsing stars that last 15 sec. Enemies that come into contact with a star cause it to burst, knocking nearby enemies upwards and dealing 351,740 Astral damage. Generates 15 Astral Power.

The Druid and their allies may pick up stars, causing them to orbit around you.
Starsurge grants 2% spell critical strike chance to 8 allies within 40 yards for 18 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 314,550 Arcane damage to the target, and 41,081 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 12 Astral Power.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 522,935 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Astral Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

While in this form, single-target attacks against you have a 15% chance to make your next Starfire instant.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 32,770 Nature damage and then an additional 424,810 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.

Generates 6 Astral Power.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Wrath, Starsurge, and Starfire damage increased by 5%.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 90 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Blasts targets within 20 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 5%.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.

Casting 2 Starfires empowers Wrath for 15 sec. Casting 2 Wraths empowers Starfire for 15 sec.

 Eclipse (Solar)
Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 60%.

 Eclipse (Lunar)
Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and the damage Starfire deals to nearby enemies is increased by 60%.
Moonfire and Sunfire damage over time has a chance to call down a falling star, dealing 60,444 Astral damage and generating 2 Astral Power.
Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 sec.
During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 200% more often.
Your next 3 Starfires are instant cast and generate 30% increased Astral Power.
Moonfire deals 10% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.
Your Wrath and Starfire chance to critically strike is increased by 10% and they generate 2 additional Astral Power.
When Eclipse ends or when you enter combat, enter a Dreamstate, reducing the cast time of your next 2 Starfires or Wraths by 40%.
Casting Starfall extends the duration of active Moonfires and Sunfires by 3.0 sec, up to 28 sec.
Your Starfire and Wrath damage has a 35% chance to cause the target to languish for an additional 60% of your spell's damage over 6 sec.
Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting 10% haste for 12 sec.

Solar Eclipse increases the damage of Wrath by an additional 20%. 

Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage by 15% and the damage it deals to nearby enemies by an additional 30%.

Sunfire damage has a chance to grow a magical mushroom at a target's location. After 1 sec, the mushroom detonates, dealing 336,657 Nature damage and then an additional 189,899 Nature damage over 10 sec. Affected targets are slowed by 50%.

Generates up to 20 Astral Power based on targets hit.
Solar Eclipse increases Wrath's Astral Power generation by 60% and Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage and Astral Power generation by 20% for each target hit beyond the first, up to 60%.
Incarnation: Chosen of Elune's cooldown is reduced to 100 seconds and it has two charges, but its duration is reduced by 20%.

Casting Wrath in an Eclipse has a 18% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.

Casting Starfire in an Eclipse has a 25% chance to make your next Starsurge or Starfall free.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage 25% more frequently.
Wrath and Starfire have a 20% chance to cause your next Wrath or Starfire cast during an Eclipse to become Astral and deal 75% additional damage.

Starsurge and Starfall grant you 8% Haste for 15 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
When you have 3 periodic effects from your spells on a target, your damage and healing on them are increased by 6%.
Every other Eclipse creates a Fury of Elune at 25% effectiveness that follows your current target for 8 sec.
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 20%, decreasing by 2% every 1 sec.
Starsurge and Starfall deal 8% increased damage and their cost is reduced by 10%.
Starsurge or Starfall increase your current Eclipse's Arcane or Nature damage bonus by an additional 2%, up to 6%.

An improved Moonkin Form that grants both Eclipses, any learned Celestial Alignment bonuses, and 10% critical strike chance.

Lasts 16 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy that follows the enemy, dealing up to 728,144 Astral damage over 8 sec within its area. Damage reduced on secondary targets.

Generates 40 Astral Power over its duration.

New Moon, Half Moon, and Full Moon deal 25% increased damage. Full Moon becomes Full Moon once more before resetting to New Moon.

Fury of Elune deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Fury of Elune
Fury of Elune now ends with a flash of energy, blasting nearby enemies for 420,589 Astral damage.

 Full Moon
New Moon and Half Moon call down 1 Minor Moon and Full Moon calls down 2 Minor Moons that deal 243,116 Astral damage and generate 3 Astral Power.
Moonfire and Starfire generate 2 additional Astral Power.
Moonfire deals 20% additional damage.
Bear Form and Moonkin Form reduce Arcane damage taken by 6% and all other magic damage taken by 3%.
Each non-Arcane damaging ability you use increases the damage of your next Arcane damaging ability by 3%, stacking up to 3 times.
Enemies damaged by Full Moon or Fury of Elune take 6% increased damage from you for 6 sec.
Using Wild Charge while in Bear Form or Moonkin Form incurs a 3 sec shorter cooldown.
Starfire deals 160% increased damage to its primary target, but no longer triggers Solar Eclipse.

Moonfire damage has a chance to call down a Fury of Elune to follow your target for 3 sec.

 Fury of Elune
Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy, dealing 271,819 Astral damage over 3 sec within its area.

Generates 15 Astral Power over its duration.
Your Arcane abilities reduce the cooldown of Fury of Elune by 2.0 sec and the cooldown of New Moon, Half Moon, and Full Moon by 1.0 sec.

Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates 6 Astral Power and its damage is increased by 50%.

 Full Moon
New Moon and Half Moon now also call down 1 Minor Moon.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 319,022 Arcane damage to the target, and 40,727 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 12 Astral Power.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 532,597 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Astral Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

While in this form, single-target attacks against you have a 15% chance to make your next Starfire instant.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.

A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 33,337 Nature damage and then an additional 424,810 Nature damage over 18 sec to the primary target and all enemies within 8 yards.

Generates 6 Astral Power.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Reduces the remaining cooldown on Solar Beam by 15 sec when it interrupts the primary target.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Wrath, Starsurge, and Starfire damage increased by 5%.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 90 sec.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 296,899 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Blasts targets within 20 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Survival Instincts and Barkskin reduce damage taken by an additional 10%.
Well-Honed Instincts can trigger up to once every 90 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
For 4 sec after shifting into Bear Form, your health and armor are increased by 15%.
Magical damage dealt by your spells increased by 5%.
You retain Lycara's Teachings' bonus from your most recent shapeshift form for 5 sec after shifting out of it, provided you remained in that form for 2.9 sec, reduced by Haste.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.

 Eclipse (Solar)
Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 60%.

 Eclipse (Lunar)

Solar Eclipse increases Wrath's Astral Power generation by 60% and Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage and Astral Power generation by 20% for each target hit beyond the first, up to 60%.
Incarnation: Chosen of Elune's cooldown is reduced to 100 seconds and it has two charges, but its duration is reduced by 20%.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage 25% more frequently.
Wrath and Starfire have a 20% chance to cause your next Wrath or Starfire cast during an Eclipse to become Astral and deal 75% additional damage.

Starsurge and Starfall grant you 8% Haste for 15 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
When you have 3 periodic effects from your spells on a target, your damage and healing on them are increased by 6%.
Every other Eclipse creates a Fury of Elune at 25% effectiveness that follows your current target for 8 sec.
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 20%, decreasing by 2% every 1 sec.
Consuming Umbral Embrace increases the damage of your Moonfire, Sunfire, Stellar Flare, Shooting Stars, and Starfall by 30% for 6 sec.
Starsurge and Starfall deal 8% increased damage and their cost is reduced by 10%.
Starsurge or Starfall increase your current Eclipse's Arcane or Nature damage bonus by an additional 2%, up to 6%.

An improved Moonkin Form that grants both Eclipses, any learned Celestial Alignment bonuses, and 10% critical strike chance.

Lasts 16 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy that follows the enemy, dealing up to 730,181 Astral damage over 8 sec within its area. Damage reduced on secondary targets.

Generates 40 Astral Power over its duration.

Moonfire and Starfire generate 2 additional Astral Power.

Enemies damaged by Full Moon or Fury of Elune take 6% increased damage from you for 6 sec.
Enemies affected by Moonfire are slowed by 20%.
Starfire deals 160% increased damage to its primary target, but no longer triggers Solar Eclipse.

Moonfire damage has a chance to call down a Fury of Elune to follow your target for 3 sec.

 Fury of Elune
Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy, dealing 274,108 Astral damage over 3 sec within its area.

Generates 15 Astral Power over its duration.

Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

New Moon and Half Moon now also call down 1 Minor Moon.

Lasts 16 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy that follows the enemy, dealing up to 716,079 Astral damage over 8 sec within its area. Damage reduced on secondary targets.

Generates 40 Astral Power over its duration.

Fury of Elune deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Further increases the power of Boundless Moonlight.

 Fury of Elune
The flash of energy now generates 6 Astral Power and its damage is increased by 50%.

 Full Moon
New Moon and Half Moon now also call down 1 Minor Moon.
Ironbark now also grants the target Nature's Grasp, rooting the first 3 melee attackers for 6 sec.
Efflorescence removes all snare effects from friendly targets when it heals and its Mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Heals the target for 225,000 over 12 sec.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 178,884 over 7 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 376,170 Astral damage.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Astral Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

While in this form, single-target attacks against you have a 15% chance to make your next Starfire instant.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your spells by 5 yards.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 3 sec.

Regrowth's duration is increased by 3 sec when cast on yourself.
Blasts targets within 20 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Roots the target and all enemies within 12 yards in place for 10 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
Casting Regrowth increases your movement speed and healing received by 8% for 6 sec.

Heals the target for 286,881 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 171,853.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 164,743 over 9 sec.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Ysera's Gift now heals every 4 sec and its healing is increased by 8% for each of your active Rejuvenations.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 22,799 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.6 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 45 yards for 1.3 million over 4.0 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 7,661 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 30 sec.

While channeling Tranquility, you take 20% reduced damage and are immune to knockbacks.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 22,593 over 6 sec.
Ironbark increases healing from your heal over time effects by 20%.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Wild Growth's healing falls off 30% less over time.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 15,687 over 6 sec.

Shapeshift into the Tree of Life, increasing healing done by 10%, increasing armor by 120%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects. Functionality of Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, Regrowth, Entangling Roots, and Wrath is enhanced.

Lasts 30 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this form for its duration.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Rejuvenation instantly heals your target for 30% of its total periodic effect and Regrowth's duration is increased by 6 sec.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Heals the target for 225,000 over 12 sec.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.

Stamina increased by 4%.

Stamina in Bear Form is increased by an additional 5%.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Increases armor by 19,766 for 7 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 3%.

While in Cat Form, when you critically strike with an attack that generates a combo point, you gain an additional combo point. Damage over time cannot trigger this effect.

Mangle critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%.
Healing you receive is increased by 4%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 15 yards by 60% for 8 sec.

You gain 12% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.
Maul the target for 105,625 Physical damage.
Thrash, Swipe, Moonfire, and Maul have a 15% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle, and to cause it to generate an additional 4 Rage.
Reduces all damage you take by 60% for 6 sec.

When you take non-periodic damage, you have a chance equal to your critical strike to cause your next Regrowth to heal for an additional 130%, and to be instant, free, and castable in all forms for 30 sec. 

This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 sec.

Sharp brambles protect you, absorbing and reflecting up to 6,869 damage from each attack.

While Barkskin is active, the brambles also deal 2,533 Nature damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec.
Mangle deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.
Survival Instincts now has 2 charges.

Frenzied Regeneration's healing is increased by up to 120% based on your missing health.

Frenzied Regeneration has 1 additional charge.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Increases the duration of Barkskin and Ironfur by 2.0 sec.
Mangle has a 15% chance to reduce the Rage cost of your next Ironfur by 25%.
Frenzied Regeneration heals over 2.0 additional sec and casts Rejuvenation and Regrowth on you at 200% effectiveness.
Gain magical damage reduction equal to 10% of your damage reduction from armor.
When you deal direct damage with Thrash, you gain a charge of Earthwarden, reducing the damage of the next auto attack you take by 25%. Earthwarden may have up to 3 charges.
Mangle increases the damage of your next cast of Maul or Raze, and casting Maul or Raze increases the damage of your next Mangle by 15%. Stacks up to 3.
Mangle generates 5 more Rage and deals 25% more damage.
Ironfur increases armor by an additional 15% and Barkskin reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.

Go berserk for 15 sec, increasing haste by 15%, and reducing the rage cost of Maul by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldown of Frenzied Regeneration by 100% and cost of Ironfur by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Increases the damage and radius of Thrash by 25%.
Thrash and Maul grant you an absorb shield for 25% of the damage dealt for 15 sec.

Thrash has a 20% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.

Thrash stacks 2 additional times.
